metadata.name: 2 Life Sentences 1/111
metadata.description:
Hello, it's Infinati. First of all, Ross' mom said she's ok and thankful for my work. Ross has a very dangerous, brave job in prison for simply creating a website similar to this one. He's currently taking care of suicidal prison inmates. I think the world would be happy to have you out of prison from two life sentences + 2 years without parole, even with strict supervision for the rest of your life. Regardless, we look up to your work even in prison. 

Why do this? I don't have another choice..

About the book club, I'm sure it has progressed, down to your own writing. We are here to help. You're only a few hours away if it comes to that..

Justice is here, and we are not Anonymous. Soon you'll be getting a nice game in the mail to escape all odds. Judging by your intellect, this will protect you from anything. I am no one to judge though. Bless up.

Why save someone else when I myself need saving? The question begs the answer..

- T**_A*******

ps. All suggested "hashtags" have been banned from all social media.

97bpm, Gm.
